TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AnnotationGroup extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation

summary.span: 表示一组批注。

span.span: Represents a group of annotations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示批注的集合。The class represents a collection of annotations. 此类可以用于操作相对于彼此的批注。This class can be used to manipulate annotations relative to each other.

summary.span: 获取或设置将批注剪辑到的图表区域的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the chart area to which the annotation is clipped.

value.span: 一个 ，表示现有图表区域的名称。

span.span: A that represents the name of an existing chart area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定图表区名称，则将仅在该图表区的绘图区中绘制批注。If a chart area name is specified, the annotation will only be drawn inside the plotting area of that chart area. 将剪切在绘图区外部批注的所有部分。All parts of the annotation outside of the plotting area will be clipped. 若要禁用图表区剪辑，请将此属性设置为或空字符串。To disable chart area clipping, set this property to or an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在相对图表或在轴坐标中，可能设置的高度和宽度的批注。The height and width of an annotation may be set in relative chart or in axes coordinates. 默认情况下，使用相对图表坐标。By default, relative chart coordinates are used. 若要使用轴坐标，设置属性`false`。To use axes coordinates, set the property to `false`. 然后是一个数据点或一组将批注固定或属性。Then either anchor the annotation to a data point or set the or properties.
